HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 7,97 EUR for shipments up to 5.00 kg.
HOME_DELIVERY.free_delivery_limit: Free delivery for orders over 66,37 EUR.
HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 3-8 working days for continental Croatia, up to 10 working days for islands.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Delivery to islands takes longer (up to 10 working days), but no specific monetary surcharge is mentioned.

BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 39,90 EUR for bikes and fitness equipment.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.delivery_time: 3-8 working days for continental Croatia, up to 10 working days for islands.
BULKY_PRODUCT_HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Delivery to islands takes longer (up to 10 working days), but no specific monetary surcharge is mentioned.

SUMMARY:
DELIVERY OPTIONS: The webshop offers home delivery for standard and bulky items, as well as in-store pickup. Delivery is limited to Croatia. Parcel shop and parcel locker options are not available.
PROVIDERS: GLS is mentioned as the delivery provider.
PRICING: Standard home delivery costs €7.97 and is free for orders over €66.37. Shipping for bulky items (bicycles, fitness equipment) is a flat rate of €39.90. The cost for in-store pickup is not specified. Cash on delivery is not an available payment method.
DELIVERY TIMES & RESTRICTIONS: Standard delivery takes 3-8 working days for mainland Croatia and up to 10 working days for islands. No specific surcharges for islands are mentioned, only longer delivery times.
NOTABLE FEATURES: The free shipping threshold is relatively low. There is a clear flat-rate fee for bulky items.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: Shipping information is located within the 'Opći uvjeti poslovanja' (General Terms and Conditions) page, making it somewhat difficult to find. A dedicated, easily accessible shipping page would improve clarity. Information on the cost of in-store pickup is missing, and details about the express delivery service are not provided beyond mentioning the provider's name.
